name: Priceless Pigs
description:
You (a pig) gain knowledge that you and your pig friends are waiting to go to the slaughterhouse to be turned into sausages (oh no!). With your newfound intelligence you must lead your mindless friends through chainsaws and explosive barrels  while trying to have the least amount of causalities possible.

:CONTROLS:

-WASD to walk around

-Mouse button 0(left click) to pick up bait
